Articles.Content: This is a plane i made

Welcome to the forums, dude! Looks like you got yourself a broken link or something. I would suggest using Imgur to host your screenshots, since the forum doesn't support direct uploads. Kind of a pain, but so it goes.

Can't wait to see what this actually looks like!

Yeah, welcome! If you need advice on how to build planes, check out http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/16-gameplay-questions-and-tutorials/ where you can ask questions all you want. Also, if you would like for others to download your craft, check out kerbalx.com, where you can upload your craft. (Also, here is imgur)
